Title: MSG 2 the Messenger
Actors: Charanpreet Insan, Honeypreet Insan, RooheMeet Insan, Sahil Insan
Plot: MSG 2 The Messenger is based on true events of Dera Sacha Sauda in years 2000-2001. Although the main story line is true, action & comedy is added for entertainment. Saint Gurmeet Ram Rahim...
